languages.text: "Это место... оно особенное, верно? Некогда здесь покоилось нечто ценное. Что это, комендант, и кто это забрал?"
"That pit... there is something special about it, is there not? An item of value was once buried there. Now tell me, Warden: what was the item and who took it from here?"
languages.original_text: "Это место... оно особенное, верно? Некогда здесь покоилось нечто ценное. Что это, комендант, и кто это забрал?"

traits.locale_text: "That pit... there is something special about it, is there not? An item of value was once buried there. Now tell me, warden: what was the item and who took it from here?"
"That pit... there is something special about it, is there not? An item of value was once buried there. Now tell me, warden: what was the item and who took it from here?"
"That pit... there is something special about it, is there not? An item of value was once buried there. Now tell me, Warden: what was the item and who took it from here?"
"That pit... there is something special about it, is there not? An item of value was once buried there. Now tell me, Warden: what was the item and who took it from here?"
"That pit... there is something special about it, is there not? An item of value was once buried there. Now tell me, Warden: what was the item and who took it from here?"

languages.text: “这个坑……有点特别，是吧？某件很有价值的物品曾埋在那里。告诉我，典狱长，那到底是什么东西？是被什么人拿走的？”
languages.original_text: "That pit... there is something special about it, is there not? An item of value was once buried there. Now tell me, Warden: what was the item and who took it from here?"

traits.locale_text: “这个坑……有点特别，是吧？某件很有价值的物品曾埋在那里。告诉我，典狱长，那到底是什么东西？是被什么人拿走的？”

languages.text: « Cette fosse... Elle a quelque chose de spécial, non ? Un objet de valeur a jadis été enterré ici. Dites-moi, directeur : quel était cet objet exactement, et qui s'en est emparé ? »
languages.original_text: "That pit... there is something special about it, is there not? An item of value was once buried there. Now tell me, Warden: what was the item and who took it from here?"

traits.locale_text: « Cette fosse... Elle a quelque chose de spécial, non ? Un objet de valeur a jadis été enterré ici. Dites-moi, directeur : quel était cet objet exactement, et qui s'en est emparé ? »

languages.text: «Ese foso... tiene algo de especial, ¿verdad? Había algo valioso enterrado dentro. Dígame, alcaide: ¿qué era y quién se lo ha llevado?».
languages.original_text: "That pit... there is something special about it, is there not? An item of value was once buried there. Now tell me, Warden: what was the item and who took it from here?"

traits.locale_text: «Ese foso... tiene algo de especial, ¿verdad? Había algo valioso enterrado dentro. Dígame, alcaide: ¿qué era y quién se lo ha llevado?».

languages.text: 「その穴…何か特別なものだろう？かつてそこには、とある貴重な物が埋められていた。さぁ、所長よ、教えるんだ。ここに埋められていた物は何だ？誰が持って行った？」
languages.original_text: "That pit... there is something special about it, is there not? An item of value was once buried there. Now tell me, Warden: what was the item and who took it from here?"

traits.locale_text: 「その穴…何か特別なものではないのか？かつて、高価値の物が埋められていたんだろう。さぁ、ワーデン、教えるんだ。ここに埋められていた物は何だ？誰が持って行った？」
「その穴…何か特別なものだろう？かつてそこには、とある貴重な物が埋められていた。さぁ、所長よ、教えるんだ。ここに埋められていた物は何だ？誰が持って行った？」

languages.text: "Dieses Loch ... es hat etwas Besonderes an sich, nicht wahr? Dort war einmal etwas Wertvolles vergraben. Nun sagt mir, Hüter: Was war es und wer hat es herausgeholt?"
languages.original_text: "That pit... there is something special about it, is there not? An item of value was once buried there. Now tell me, Warden: what was the item and who took it from here?"

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Loch ... es hat etwas Besonderes an sich, nicht wahr? Dort war einmal etwas Wertvolles vergraben. Nun sagt mir, Hüter: Was war es und wer hat es herausgeholt?"

languages.text: "Şu çukurun özel bir yanı var, değil mi? Zamanında içinde değerli bir eşya gömülüymüş. Söyle bakalım müdür, o eşya neydi ve onu oradan kim aldı?"
languages.original_text: "That pit... there is something special about it, is there not? An item of value was once buried there. Now tell me, Warden: what was the item and who took it from here?"

traits.locale_text: "Şu çukurun özel bir yanı var, değil mi? Zamanında içinde değerli bir eşya gömülüymüş. Söyle bakalım müdür, o eşya neydi ve onu oradan kim aldı?"
